description.en:
### Viewer Discretion Advised

After a hard day of work, an ordinary salaryman finds himself in a dark alleyway late at night face-to-face with a mysterious, sexy young woman and her piercing eyes! She invites him to her place nearby, and under her trance he finds himself returning daily for more and more while experiencing overwhelming pleasure. Little does he realize his energy is depleting as the fluids flow from his body with each new visit. Better to rest in peace in the heat of passion than in the cold hard ground. (Source: FAKKU)

1. [The Way Home](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/the-way-home-english) / Kaerimichi nite (帰り道にて); Comic Bavel 2017-12
• You mustn't look at it... You mustn't touch it... Or you'll never be seen again...
2. [Baku](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/baku-english) (貘); Comic Bavel 2019-02
• Let me show you what happens... on this endless night.
3. [I'm Right Behind You](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/im-right-behind-you-english) / Anata no Ushiro (アナタノウシロ); Comic Bavel 2018-03
• Curiosity... Violated the cat...
4. [Yamatsumi](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/yamatsumi-english) (山祇ーヤマツミー); Comic Bavel 2019-07
• Do not let it entice you…lest you be spirited away…
5. [Stigmatized Property](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/stigmatized-property-english) / Jikobukken (事故物件); Comic Bavel 2019-04
• You shouldn’t…use that room…
6. [The Spider's Web](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/the-spiders-web-english-1534413686) / Kumo no I (クモノイ); Comic Bavel 2018-07
• Let me devour you...
7. [Princess of the River](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/princess-of-the-river-english) / Kawahime-sama (カワヒメサマ); Comic Bavel 2018-04
• Come... Come... Come over here... Come into the river.
8. [Last Train](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/last-train-english-1540849683) / Saishuu Densha (最終電車); Comic Bavel 2018-12
• A shocking combination of horror and erotica that will tear at your heart!!
9. [Together Forever...](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/together-forever-english-1536804077) / Zutto Issho... (ずっといっしょ…); Comic Bavel 2018-10
• Horror and Pleasure... this stimulation is too much!! A young maiden embraces her boyfriend after a car crash. [Contains gore]
10. [Something is Lurking](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/something-is-lurking-english) / Nanika Iru... (なにかいる…); Comic Bavel 2019-09
• Do you have the courage…to gaze into the abyss?
11. I'm Right Behind You 2 / Anata no Ushiro 2 (アナタノウシロ2); kakioroshi
